description.en: DynamicField backend to provide access to RemoteDB for OTRS
description.de: DynamicField-Backend zur Bereitstellung des Zugangs zu Datenbanken fuer OTRS

intro.title: Install Information
text: You are about to install the OTRS module DynamicFieldITSMConfigItem.
It is recommended to delete the OTRS-cache and perform a configuration rebuild before you continue the use of this OTRS installation.
